questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: I would like to have a familly. One or two children. Be married maybe and have a very beautiful house ! But, my very importante project for the futur is have a great job. I would like to work in communication, my domains. Work in compagny or communication agence for example. Why not go away too. Go in on island where the life is more easy you know.
